title: Linear and rotational motion - ball down ramp

content.question: A ball of radius <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> starts from rest and rolls without slipping down a ramp in a time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>, reaching a final speed <math alttext="v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mstyle></math> at the bottom of the ramp. Which of the following is a correct expression for the angular acceleration of the ball as it rolls down the ramp?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction g over uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction v sub f over t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction v sub f over t uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction v sub f over t uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mrow><mi>t</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
